description:
Comfort for growing single-track hounds and junior rouleurs. Designed for young riders, the Zig-Zag Shorts have the same attention to detail and quality as the grownup model: flat seams, grippy elastic cuffs and reflective trim.

  • Made of nylon, polyester and LYCRA that's durable and quick to dry
  • 8-panel design provides full range of motion
  • Flatlock seams won't chafe on long rides
  • Encased elastic waistband stays put
  • Padded, contoured chamois
  • Reflective trim heightens visibility
  • Grippy elastic cuffs prevent slippage
name: MEC Zigzag Bike Shorts - Youths
